body_html:
The idea to remove all DataFeeders - and replace them with input functions that are using feeding_functions.

See example for pandas_input_fn - it already supports dicts passing.

What we need now to implement is enqueue_data to support also an iterators and write a something like iter_input_fn.
body_text:
The idea to remove all DataFeeders - and replace them with input functions that are using feeding_functions.
See example for pandas_input_fn - it already supports dicts passing.
What we need now to implement is enqueue_data to support also an iterators and write a something like iter_input_fn.
body:
The idea to remove all DataFeeders - and replace them with input functions that are using [feeding_functions](https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/contrib/learn/python/learn/dataframe/queues/feeding_functions.py).

See example for [pandas_input_fn](https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/contrib/learn/python/learn/learn_io/pandas_io.py) - it already supports dicts passing.

What we need now to implement is `enqueue_data` to support also an iterators and write a something like `iter_input_fn`.
